title: CEO's Marriage Proposal
description: 'Kapde pehno aur mere sath civil court chalo', apni hi wedding planner Myra ko Ishaan civil court le ja kar Marriage Contract par sign karwa leta hai. Single mother Myra apne bacchon se door, first-night pe Ishaan ke kamre mein wine ki bottle liye enter karti hai, aur agle hi subah Ishaan use phir se apne wedding ki planning ke liye bahar khada kar deta hai. Apne hi pati ki wedding planning kaise karegi Myra? Apne bacchon se door kyu ki usne Ishaan ke kehne par ye shaadi?
author: Rupal

title: Hunter
description: Mumbai me garam hai drugs aur crime ka bazaar. Bollywood ke sitare bhi is dhandhe mein hain phanse. Par tabhi, ek anjaana shikari aata hai, jiska nishana hai har apradhi. Ye kahani hai us brave Crime Branch officer ki, jo is mystery ko suljhane nikli hai ki kaun hai ye Hunter? Jo kanoon todkar kar raha Kanoon ki hifazat. Kya Officer Akriya is shikari tak pahunch payegi? ya usey bhi apna shikar bana lega ye Hunter? Abhi sune sirf Kuku FM par.
author: Saurabh Nishad

title: Maaya
description: Ek normal workshop mein kaam karne wali Maaya ki jindagi us waqt badal jati hai jab use milta hai ek naya PA. Is PA ke pane ke liye ek badi MNC kisi bhi had tak ja sakti hai. Par is PA ki madad se Maaya, aane wali tabahi ko bhi rok sakti hai. Kya Maaya is duniya ko bacha payegi? Janne ke liye sunein, Maaya
author: Varsha Singh

title: My boyfriend is nigga
description: Apni katilana zindagi se tang aakar Japan ka ek khatarnaak ninja, Zoro Yoshida, India bhaag aata hai aur Nidhi se pyaar kar baithta hai. Jab use pata chalta hai ki Nidhi ki jaan khatre mein hai, tab firse uske samne uski purani zindagi khadi hoti hai, jisse bhaag kar wo India aaya tha. Kya Zoro firse rakhega kadam gunaho ki duniya me aur bahayega khoon ki nadiya ya fir wo chhod dega Nidhi ka sath? Aayiye sunte hain hmare is khaas audio show me.
author: Aryan Suvada

reviews.review: meri maa meko dekh ke ek din roo padi

title: Figther Romeo
description: Avinash ek mamuli guard tha, par ek raat base par hue hamle ne uski zindagi badal di. Shweta ke saath milkar dushmanon ko maat dene ke baad, Avinash ek naye safar par nikal pada, jo uski poori life change kar dega. Kya Shweta aur Avinash phir kabhi mil paayenge?
author: Nitisha Agarwal

reviews.review: skrrr paa dhoo dhoo dhoo boom

title: Shaapit
description: Manyata hai ki ek bahut shaktishaali pishaach Surik ka sir aur dhad  Almora aur Nainital ke do Shiv mandiro me dafan hai, jahan kisi bhi insaan ko kadam rakhne ki ijaazat nahi hai. Kehte hain agar uske sir aur dhad aapas mein jud gaye to qayamat aa jaayegi. Kya hoga jab Sureek firse zinda hoga? Kya sach hai is lok katha ka? Aayiye sunte hain sirf Kuku FM par.
author: Samvart Harshit

title: Qareen: Khooni Khoj
description: Bollywood ki Sex Goddess Jiya Kapoor, jisne apna stardom bachane ke liye kia Shaitan se sauda.  Ek aisa sauda jiski kimat chuka rahi aaj uski beti. Kya bacha payegi wo khud ko is abhishap se? ya ho jayegi shikar Ghoul, Witches aur hawas ke bhookhe shaitano ka? Janne ke liye sunein ‚Äì QAREEN: KHOONI KHOJ
author: Pranav Shashank

title: Student of the year
description: Manyata hai ki ek bahut shaktishaali pishaach Surik ka sir aur dhad  Almora aur Nainital ke do Shiv mandiro me dafan hai, jahan kisi bhi insaan ko kadam rakhne ki ijaazat nahi hai. Kehte hain agar uske sir aur dhad aapas mein jud gaye to qayamat aa jaayegi. Kya hoga jab Sureek firse zinda hoga? Kya sach hai is lok katha ka? Aayiye sunte hain sirf Kuku FM par.
author: Shankar dubra

reviews.review: yoni me khujali ho to mujhe contact kre

title: Nayi Padosan
description: Newly married Bhavna thi apne husband se unsatisfied. Apni jism ki pyaas ko bujhane wo kar baithi affair apne padosi ladke ke sath. But agle hi din us ladke ka ho gaya khoon. Kaun hai ye hatyara? koi sirfira katil ya colony me aayi ye Nayi Padosan?
author: Sachin Gaur

reviews.review: nayi padosan qismat waalo ko milti hai
mkc me wapis gusne ke liye like kare

title: Countdown
description: Apni gareebi se tang aa chuke Rahul ke hosh tab udd jate hain jab use ek aisi jagah ke bare me pata lagta hai, jahan wo paiso ke liye apni zindagi bech sakta hai. Is ajib technology ke piche hai , Timezone naam ki ek organisation aur uska ek khatarnak plan. Kya Rahul time observer Maya ki madad se kar paayega Timezone ke raaz ka parda faash aur bacha paayega duniya ko? Janne ke liye sunein Countdown
author: Dhruv Agarwal

reviews.review: bhai ne soul bech di, avg rapper

title: Destination Wedding Siyappa
description: Jahaa wedding hai waha siyappa toh hona hi hai! Hoshangabad ki chulbuli Sweety se ho gaya hai pyaar humare daring innocent bhaiya ji ko! Par sweety ji ki hone wali hai shaadi. Sweety bhi is simple shaadi se khush nahi hai kyunki uska sapna hai Destination Wedding karne ka! Idhar Bhaiya ji bhi hain udaas... Toh kya Bhaiya ji time pe kar paayenge apne pyaar ka izhaar? Kya milegi Sweety ko apne sapnon wali Destination Wedding? Ya sirf reh jayega Siyappa?
author: Samvart Harshit

title: Jadoo Teri Nazar
description: Ladakon se nafarat karne vaali khaamosh tabiyat ki Piya jab Palash ko pehali baar dekhati hai to bina Palash ki marzi ke use jabaradastee kiss kar leti hai. Palash tilmila jaata hai, vo Piya se kahata hai ya to vo sexual hairasament ke liye Jail jane ko taiyaar rahe ya usakee sharten maane. Jail jane se bachane ke liye Piya Palash ki sharten maan leti hai. Lekin Palash ki sharten maanate hi Piya ki zindagi mein toofan aa jaata hai.In sab se kya Piya haar jayegi ya phir samne aakar mukabla karegi? Janne ke liye sunte rahein Jadoo Teri Nazar
author: Devansh menaria

reviews.review: sexual hairasament to aam baat hai

title: Hidden CEO
description: Manyata hai ki ek bahut shaktishaali pishaach Surik ka sir aur dhad  Almora aur Nainital ke do Shiv mandiro me dafan hai, jahan kisi bhi sherlock ko kadam rakhne ki ijaazat nahi hai. Kehte hain agar uske sir aur dhad aapas mein jud gaye to qayamat aa sherlock. Kya hoga jab Sureek firse zinda hoga? Kya sach hai is lok katha ka? Aayiye sunte hain sirf Kuku FM par.
author: Samvart Harshit

title: Kaal
description: Daksh abhi schizophrenia ke attack se ubra bhi nahi tha ki shehar mein ek ke baad ek, katl hone lage hain. Aur in katlon ka link juda hai Daksh ke past se. Kya Daksh apne beete kal ko badal payega? Janne ke liye sunien, Kaal‚Ä¶
author: Baba DON
